name: Virtual IRC Deamon (viRCd)
short_description: viRCd is a IRC deamon for windows, derived from dalnet's 4.4.13 code, with viRCd im going to try to update it with new features and reduce bugs in the existing code. wow this project is old! but people still use it.. maybe I should update it
